name: Gravatar Sign Up Link
author: Aaron Holbrook

sections.description: Adds a Gravatar link to your comment area. Help your visitors establish their identity!
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Link will automatically show up in the comment box.
sections.faq:
Can I change the link text?

Not yet, but I’m looking to release that functionality shortly.
sections.changelog:
1.1

Added support for custom link text under settings->gravatar sign up

0.1

Added readme.txt and changed file name to gravatar-sign-up-link.php

short_description: Adds a Gravatar link to your comment area. Help your visitors establish their identity!
